evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "* Installation: [A single installer script](https://bcbio-nextgen.readthedocs.io/en/latest/contents/installation.html#automated) prepares all third party software, data libraries and system configurat"

"Validated, scalable, community developed variant calling, RNA-seq and small RNA analysis. You write a high level configuration file... This input drives a parallel run" (end-user analysis application).

"bcbio provides a shared community resource that handles the data processing component of sequencing analysis, providing researchers with more time to focus on the downstream biology." (directly performs research data analysis).
